sentences.sContent: With the effective of zone, the language, consuetude , folkway and circumstance with the folk music attached are quite different.
sentences.sContent_eng: With the effective of zone, the language, consuetude , folkway and circumstance with the folk music attached are quite different.
sentences.sCn: 由于受地域的影响，语言、习俗、民风、环境以及所依附的民间音乐等各不相同。

remMethod.val: folk(民族， 人们) + way(方式) → 人们生活的方式 → 民风
